channel.title: AccessiTech Blog
channel.description: Explore expert-written articles, tools, and tips to help you build better, more inclusive digital products.
channel.item:
AI for Coding Accessibility https://accessi.tech/blog/AI-for-Coding-Accessibility 2025-04-08 How developers with disabilities use AI like Copilot to code through chronic pain—where it excels (boilerplate, error fixing), where it fails, and why human judgment still rules. undefined
Yellow text on dark blue background saying, AI for Coding Accessibility, How Tools Like Copilot Help Me Ship Code Despite Chronic Pain
AccessiTech LLC

item.title: Building a More Accessible Future Through Design and Technology
item.description: Conor, founder of AccessiTech LLC and a disability advocate, shares how lived experience with Psoriatic Arthritis drives his mission to make tech inclusive. Offering audits, mentorship, and open-source tools, he bridges the gap between accessibility theory and real-world solutions. Join the movement for a web that works for all.
item.media:description: Dark blue text on yellow background saying, Building a More Accessible Future Through Design and Technology

channel.item:
How AccessiTech Meets You Where You Are https://accessi.tech/blog/How-AccessiTech-Meets-You-Where-You-Are 2025-04-03 Most ‘accessible’ tech fails disabled users. AccessiTech’s services (audits, QA, mentorship) fix that—because compliance isn’t enough. Here’s how we rebuild inclusion. undefined
Black text on pink background saying "Accessibility Isn't One-Size-Fits-All How AccessiTech Meets You Where You Are"
AccessiTech LLC

Introduction to WCAG - What It Is and Why It Matters https://accessi.tech/blog/Introduction-to-WCAG-What-It-Is-and-Why-It-Matters 2025-05-29 Learn what WCAG is, why web accessibility matters, and how it impacts users, laws, and inclusive design practices. Start building accessible websites today. undefined
Dark blue text on yellow background saying, Introduction to WCAG, What it is and Why it Matters
AccessiTech LLC

The Four Principles of Accessibility (POUR) https://accessi.tech/blog/The-Four-Principles-of-Accessibility-POUR 2025-06-12 Discover the four foundational principles of web accessibility—Perceivable, Operable, Understandable, and Robust (POUR)—with practical examples and tips for building inclusive digital experiences. undefined
Four colored blocks labeled Perceivable, Operable, Understandable, Robust
AccessiTech LLC

channel.title: WCAG Explained
channel.description: Learn about the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) and how to implement them effectively.
channel.item:
